00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Application
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Application()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Application(XmlElement Element)
00048         {
00049             if (Element.Name.Equals("application", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00050             {
00051                 if (Element.Attributes["name"] != null)
00052                 {
00053                     Name = Element.Attributes["name"].Value;
00054                 }
00055                 Data = Element.InnerXml;
00056             }
00057         }
00058         #endregion
00059 
00060         #region Properties
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064         public string Name
00065         {
00066             get { return _Name; }
00067             set { _Name = value; }
00068         }
00069         private string _Name = "";
00070 
00074         public string Data
00075         {
00076             get { return _Data; }
00077             set { _Data = value; }
00078         }
00079         private string _Data = null;
00080         #endregion
00081 
00082         #region Overridden Functions
00083         public override string ToString()
00084         {
00085             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00086             Builder.Append("<Application name=\"" + Name + "\">");
00087             Builder.Append(Data);
00088             Builder.Append("</Application>");
00089             return Builder.ToString();
00090         }
00091         #endregion
00092     }
00093 }
